testsuite.name: SRSproject.SRSproject.CartPageTest
testsuite.system-out: Items price is same in PDP and Cart Page i.e Cart Price : 30.96 = PDP Price : 30.96
UOM EA is Present in PLP
Call for Availability Text is Present
